alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 27 at 3:03PM HST until November 28 at 10:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY FOR BIG ISLAND SUMMITS UNTIL 10 AM HST MONDAY... .An area of deep moisture will continue to move over the islands from the south, bringing clouds and showers to the high elevations of the Big Island. Temperatures are expected to dip just below freezing overnight, with periods of snow and freezing fog. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow and freezing fog. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...Until 10 AM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Dangerously slippery roads and limited visibilities.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet, or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities and use caution while driving.
